name: Princess wanna rob some graves! Yo?!
name_original: Princess wanna rob some graves! Yo?!
description:
Game for June to July Metroidvania Jam.

Not exactly metroidvania, more like explorative platformer with quite heavy focus on secrets and stuff.

The goal of the game is to find 8 artifact stones hidden in the dungeon.

Controls:

WASD -- D-pad

J, CONTROL -- Attack

K, SPACE -- Jump

Also, the game has tons of character movements and quite a few attack types, but it's for you to discover :3

Hope you'll have fun playing da gaem :3

P.S.: It's kinda my first completed gaem written in C++, so, if you encounter some bugs and glitches, please post it here. Feedback is very appreciated :3
